title: v1.0.0
items: Dark Facetted Grace of the Elves necklaces are now better supported. The bot will refill your GotE to be > 1500 porters on certain banking trips. (Special thanks to @thesn0w for sponsoring this improvement!)
Fixed an issue with material deposits at the Experiment Workbench hotspot in Orthen's Observation outpost site
Fixed an issue where Aetherium Alloy was not being detected as a material

title: v1.0.0
items: The script will now equip porters to the player directly when a Grace of the Elves is not found
Fixed an issue that was causing the 'Artefact count' to increase when banking
Fixed an issue that could cause the script to idle if started while already standing at the hotspot
Increased the delay after teleporting to a digsite via Arch Guild table teleport. This should help alleviate the back-and-forth teleport some users with slower connections were experiencing

title: v1.0.0
items: Fixed an issue that was preventing instanced areas like Sentistenn's Colosseum and Warforge's Thalmund's Forge from being calculated correctly
Fixed a traversal issue to the Everlight Amphitheatre

title: v1.0.0
items: Fixed an issue that was causing the bot to bank without a full inventory while excavating at the Kharid-Et and Stormguard Citadel digsite starting zones
Fixed an issue that was causing the bot to occasionally teleport back to the Arch Guild when landing in the target digsite

title: v1.0.0
items: Fixed a traversal issue to Everlight's Mass Grave site

title: v1.0.0
items: Navigation for Infernal Source Middle and Bottom levels will now use the appropriate menu option when interacting with the digsite's entrance.
Fixed a traversal issue to the Byzoth remains hotspot in the Infernal Source digsite.
Fixed an issue that was causing the 'quick-bank' logic to not take  Complete tomes, Rex skeleton fragments, and Pylon batteries into account.
Fixed an issue that'd cause the bot to stand idly when a Dialog prompt was opened but the bot needed to destroy Pylon batteries or Rex skeleton fragments.

title: v1.0.0
items: Fixed shambling horror
Bot will now ensure candles are placed before starting a ritual

title: v1.0.0
items: Release
